title: Just Realized this, wheres my icon?
body: After coming back after taking a little break of 2 weeks or so. ive been chilling and i went to look at the store to see the new stuff but i realized something when looking to change my icon from this skuttle crab, wheres my Zaun icon? i know for a fact that i redeemed it on the correct version of the website and it says "Icons will be granted up to two weeks after February 2, 2017 at 23:59 PT." its already 19th. so i should have gotten it 3 days ago. whats up? is it just not showing up cuz i use beta?

replies.body: Sometimes our systems miss players in the granting waves. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll sort this out with you. ^.^
